title: Parents of Young Children Desperately Seek Vaccine Trials
author: The New York Times
description: Impatient parents who are seeking off-label adult shots for their children concern officials like Dr. Sean O'Leary ACCORDS
sitename: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus
cleaned_text: Impatient parents who are seeking off-label adult shots for their children concern officials like Dr. Sean O'Leary, vice chairman of the committee on infectious diseases at the American Academy of Pediatrics. CU Anschutz CU Medicine Building 13199 East
